content:
Yes, I'm familiar with Charles Whiteman. He is the Co-Founder and CEO of Lamatic.ai, a company focused on simplifying the integration of generative AI into business applications. Charles has a background in scaling businesses, having previously grown Divers Direct into the world's largest SCUBA retailer and played a significant role in guiding MotionPoint to a $70 million exit. citeturn0search6

At Lamatic.ai, Charles leads efforts to provide a fully managed, end-to-end collaborative generative AI development platform. The platform aims to eliminate engineering complexities associated with AI integration, offering features like model connectors, agent workflows, data connectors, and integrations to accelerate the deployment of AI-powered applications. citeturn0search0

Charles is passionate about helping companies leverage generative AI to create differentiation and gain a competitive advantage. citeturn0search3
